Class Feature

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.model.world.location.dungeon.feature.Feature
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Altar, Brazier, Campfire, Chest, Door, Fountain, FruitTree, Herb, Inhabitant, LearningStone, Mirror, Portal, Spirit, StairsDown, StairsUp, Throne, Trap
    public abstract class Feature
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    An interactive dungeon tile.

    • Method Detail

      • generate

        public void generate()
        TODO evolve on 2.0+
        Parameters:
        map - Adds itself to this map.

      • activate

        public abstract boolean activate()
        Called when a Squad reaches this location.
        Returns:
        true if the Squad activates this feature or false if it is ignored.

      • discover

        public void discover​(Combatant searching,
                     int searchroll)
        Called when the Squad is passing nearby this feature. If it's hidden, might have a chance of revealing it.
        Parameters:
        searching - The unit that is actively looking around (usually the one with highest perception).
        searchroll - A Perception roll (usually a take-10, to prevent scumming). If you want to have an automatic success, inform a high number like 9000, because if you use Integer.MAX_VALUE, it may overflow after internal bonuses being applied.
        See Also:
        draw

      • place

        public void place​(Dungeon d)

      • remove

        public void remove()

      • getlocation

        public Point getlocation()
        Returns:
        A point representing this feature.
